body:
Comment 2: 
Nick, do you want to submit your patch for review?

See:
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html

We don't do codereviews over the issue tracker and all our workflow tools assume that
codereview.appspot.com.

If you're doing this for work (for Yandex), you'll also need to submit a corporate CLA
(http://code.google.com/legal/corporate-cla-v1.0.html).  It sounds like a lot of pain,
but it's not too bad, and it'll make future contributions trivial.
